text:
NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
OFFICE OF EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR
14 GREGORY HALL
URBANA, ILLINOIS
October 2 0, 1959
Mr. William G. Harley
Radio Hall
University of Wisconsin
Madison 6, Wisconsin
Dear Bill:
Here is hasty (what isn't?) estimate of cost of Washington move.
Hope it meets your needs. Sending copy to Hull and Miles and
bringing extras.
Best,
Harry J. Skornia
Executive Director
hj sirs
